                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>63.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.527</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="width: 15.412em; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-34"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.797em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.63em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-51"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-size: 70.7%; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.797em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>63.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.527</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">W=\frac{MIt}{eF}=\frac{63.5\times7\times40\times60}{2\times96500}g=5.527\ g </script></span></p>
</span>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 2 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>মল্ট ভিনেগার প্রস্তুতিতে ঈস্টের বৃদ্ধিতে কোনটি সহায়তা করে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>

                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 3 </span>

position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-236"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-237"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>κ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>A</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>31</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>0.9</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>c</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.029</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>c</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\kappa=\frac{1}{R}\times\left(\frac{l}{A}\right)=\left(\frac{1}{31}\times0.9\right)\ \Omega^{-1}cm^{-1}=0.029\Omega^{-1}cm^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.83em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-412"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-417"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-420"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-423"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.44</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.182em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.78</mn><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mn>0.34</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.44</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">E_{cell}^0=E_{Fe/Fe^{2+}}^0+E_{Cu^{2+}/Cu}^0\Rightarrow0.78=E_{Fe/Fe^{2+}}^0+0.34 \\
\therefore\ \ E_{Fe/Fe^{2+}}^0=0.44V 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 5 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.281em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>C</mi><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>P</mi><mi>b</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">
3Cr+2{\rm Pb}^{2+}\rightarrow3Cr^{3+}+2Pb </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

padding-left: 0.263em;">1.1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.188em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.05</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.1</mn><mi>V</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">Zn/ZnSO_4\left(0.05M\right)||CuSO_4\left(0.2M\right)/Cu [E_{cell}^0=1.1V]</script></span>;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-704"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-705"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-size: 50%; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.118</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>Z</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>0.05</mn><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.118</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>V</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">E_{cell}=E_{cell}^0-\frac{RT}{eF}ln \frac{\left[Zn^{2+}\right]}{ [Cu^{2+}]}  = 1.1-\frac{8.314\times300}{2\times96500}\ln{\left(\frac{0.05}{0.2}\right)V=1.118\ V}</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                    </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>63.5</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.58</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="width: 16.314em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-836"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-853"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-858"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-860"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-861"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>63.5</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.58</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">Z=\frac{M}{eF}=\frac{63.5}{1\times96500}=6.58\times{10}^{-4}gC^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 8 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি অ্যালুমিনিয়াম তারের মধ্য দিয়ে 8s&nbsp;ধরে&nbsp;0.2mA&nbsp;তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে কতটি ইলেকট্রন প্রবাহিত হবে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="width: 5.239em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.283em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.186em, 1004.28em, 2.325em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-872"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-873"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">7.8\times{10}^{16} </script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;টি</p>
</label>

                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে,&nbsp;N =&nbsp;ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা এবং&nbsp;e =&nbsp;ইলেকট্রনের চার্জ</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="width: 21.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1017.5em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-909"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-915" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-916" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-921"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-922" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-924" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.73em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.883em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-927"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-929" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-930"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-931"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-932"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-934"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-935"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.12em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.555em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-940"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-941" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-943"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-944"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-945"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-947"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-948"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">19</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.895em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-955"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-956"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-958"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-959"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>e</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">Q=It=Ne\Rightarrow N=\frac{It}{e}=\frac{0.2\times{10}^{-3}\times8}{1.6\times{10}^{-19}}=10\times{10}^{15} </script></span>&nbsp;টি</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 9 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>ক্যাথোডে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>54</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="width: 4.771em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.914em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.88em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-962"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">54</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>54</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">54\ gm\ Al </script></span>&nbsp;সঞ্চিত করতে কী পরিমাণ বিদ্যুৎ লাগবে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>54</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.3em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-990"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">54</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1005" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>54</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">54\ gm\ Al=2\ mol\ Al </script></span></p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="width: 6.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.21em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1008"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">1\ mol\ Al\equiv3F</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>579000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="width: 18.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1015.53em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1021"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">96500</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">579000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>579000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\therefore2\ mol\ Al\equiv6F=6\times96500C=579000\ C </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 10 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোনটি প্রাইমারি নির্দেশক তড়িৎদ্বার?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ক্যালোমেল তড়িৎদ্বার</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কুইন-&nbsp;হাইড্রোজেন তড়িৎদ্বার</p>
</label>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্লাস তড়িৎদ্বার</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রমাণ হাইড্রোজেন তড়িৎদ্বার</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 11 </span>
                    </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>w</mi><mi>z</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11.52</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mfrac><mn>63.5</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>35013.54</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="width: 16.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1013.69em, 2.994em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1107"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">w</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>তড়িৎদ্বার ও দ্রবণ একই ধাতুর হলে ঘনমাত্রা অপরিবর্তিত থাকে।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 13 </span>
                    </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="width: 11.477em;                     <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>22.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="width: 3.372em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.735em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.69em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1260"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">22.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>22.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">

</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1296"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6.02</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1306"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1310"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1311"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">22.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12.04</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>22.4</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>22.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">n_1e_1=n_2e_2 \\
\Rightarrow\frac{12.04\times{10}^{23}}{6.02\times{10}^{23}}\times2=\frac{V}{22.4}\times4\Rightarrow V=22.4\ L 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি ব্যাটারিতে সংঘটিত অর্ধকোষ বিক্রিয়া&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="width: 9.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.34em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1328"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1333"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.567em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.057em, 1001.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1335"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1336"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.544em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">Ni\rightarrow N{i^{2+}}^\ +2e</script></span>;&nbsp;উক্ত কোষটি সাম্যাবস্থায় আছে। যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>E</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="width: 5.963em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.883em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.88em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1347"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1348"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.78em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সাম্যাবস্থায়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>E</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.98</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>36</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="width: 18.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1015.45em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1413"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1426"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1429"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1434"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1436"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.98</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1444"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1445"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1447"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1448"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>E</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.98</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>36</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">E=0,\ 0=E^0-\frac{RT}{nF}\ \ln{k}\therefore k=3.98\times{10}^{36} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
