                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3446.4</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="width: 4.328em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.554em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1003.55em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1487"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3446.4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3446.4</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">
3446.4C
</script></span></p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow><mn>22.4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3446.4</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="width: 11.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.47em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1491"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.1em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.047em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1495"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1501" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.26em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.264em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3446.4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow><mn>22.4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3446.4</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">Q=\frac{2\times96500\times0.4}{22.4}=3446.4C </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 20 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোন চাপের জন্য, ধাতু বা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="width: 1.567em; top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1544"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1545"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.387em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>0.0591</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>100</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">E_{cell}-E_{cell}^0=-\frac{0.0591}{2}\log{\frac{C_1}{C_2}}\Rightarrow\log{\frac{C_1}{C_2}}=-2\\
\Rightarrow\frac{C_1}{C_2}={10}^{-2}=1:100 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 24 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="width: 3.281em;                     <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>127</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1012.91em, 7.092em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">127</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -2.662em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1012.91em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -1.473em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">386000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.346em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>127</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>≡</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>≡</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>≡</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>386000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">127\ gm\ Cu\equiv2\ mol\ Cu \\
1\ mol\ Cu\equiv2F \\
\therefore 2\ mol\ Cu\equiv4F=386000 \ C 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 3 </span>
                        
                    </div>

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">4\ N_A </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>167.6</mn><mn>55.85</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="width: 20.863em; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="row question">

                    <div class="serial">

width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mi>o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.05</mn><mi>V</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">Ni\left(s\right){/Ni}^{2+}\left(0.2M\right)||Ag^+\left(0.1M\right)/Ag\left(s\right)\ [E_{cell}^o=1.05V]</script></span>;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>27</mn><mi>o</mi></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="width: 2.647em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.163em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.16em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-218"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                     </div>

height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.011</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.961em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.448em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>1.05</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.011</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">E_{cell}=E_{cell}^0-\frac{RT}{eF}ln \frac{[Ni^{2+}]}{[Ag^+]^2} 


\\ =1.05-\frac{8.314\times300}{2\times96500}\ln{\frac{0.2}{\left(0.1\right)^2}}V=1.011\ V </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="width: 11.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.387em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.39em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-340"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">Q=\left(ne\right)=4\times4F=16F </script></span>&nbsp;(যেহেতু,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.53em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-358"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-365"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">1\ mol\ O_2\equiv4F)</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 6 </span>

            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                    </div>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1:100</p>

                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>

                </div>

                        <div class="input-group-prepend">

            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.387em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>0.0591</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>100</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">E_{cell}-E_{cell}^0=-\frac{0.0591}{2}\log{\frac{C_1}{C_2}}\Rightarrow\log{\frac{C_1}{C_2}}=-2 \\
\Rightarrow\frac{C_1}{C_2}={10}^{-2}=1:100 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষ্যের আপেক্ষিক পরিবাহিতা নির্ভর করে কোনটির উপর?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তাপমাত্রা</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দ্রবণের গাঢ়ত্ব</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দ্রাবকের প্রকৃতি</p>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 9 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো পরিবাহিতা কোষের কোষ ধ্রুবক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.28</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="width: 5.292em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.324em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.32em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-538"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.28</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-542"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-544"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-545"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কোষ ধ্রুবক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2.28</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>A</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mn>1.75</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.28</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.99</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="width: 22.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1018.28em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-581"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.28</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.75</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.28</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.75</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.99</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2.28</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>A</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mn>1.75</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.28</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.99</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">=2.28=\frac{l}{A}=\frac{l}{1.75}\Rightarrow l=2.28\times1.75\ cm=3.99\ cm</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 10 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>W</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>52</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>h</mi><mi>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>40</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="width: 23.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1018.73em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-662"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.36em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-666"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-670"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.48em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.6em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-677"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.11em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-681"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1004.1em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.047em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-686"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">52</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.26em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.264em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">17</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>W</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>52</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>h</mi><mi>r</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>40</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">W=\frac{MIt}{eF}\Rightarrow t=\frac{WeF}{MI}=\frac{2.2\times3\times96500}{52\times0.2}sec=17\ hr\ 40sec\  </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 11 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>তুঁতের জলীয় দ্রবণে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>180</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="width: 4.137em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.392em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.36em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-711"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>180</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">180\ mA </script></span>&nbsp;শক্তির বিদ্যুৎ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>35</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="width: 3.802em; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-761"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-762"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-764"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-765"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-size: 70.7%; 11.79\times{10}^{20} 
</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>35</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.023</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>11.79</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="width: 26.355em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>35</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>6.023</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>11.79</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">N=\frac{It}{eF}\times N_A=\frac{180\times{10}^{-3}\times35\times60}{2\times96500}\times6.023\times{10}^{23}=11.79\times{10}^{20}</script></span>&nbsp;টি</p>
</span>

            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 12 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি ধাতব লবণের জলীয় দ্রবণে&nbsp;&nbsp;0.5A&nbsp;বিদ্যুৎ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="width: 3.132em;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>108</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.168</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="width: 11.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.72em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-836"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.36em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-840"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-844"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 14 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোন আয়নটির&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="width: 1.455em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1001.19em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-906"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-907"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>I</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">I^- </script></span>&nbsp;এর চেয়ে জারণ প্রবণতা বেশি?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জারণ প্রবণতার ক্রম:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>O</mi><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msup><mi>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>B</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>S</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>N</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-941" style="width: 18.527em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>O</mi><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo>&gt;</mo><msup><mi>I</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo>&gt;</mo><mi>B</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo>&gt;</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo>&gt;</mo><mi>S</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>&gt;</mo><mi>N</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">OH^->I^->Br^->Cl^->SO_4^{2-}>NO_3^-</script></span></p>

                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>গলিত&nbsp;NaCl&nbsp;এর তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষণে অ্যানোডে কী উৎপন্ন হবে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>S</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>S</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.45</mn><mi>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="width: 17.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1014.02em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1041"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1042"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1051"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1052"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block;
