font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1074" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3600</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1001.89em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.941em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1077"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.45</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>S</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>S</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3.7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.45</mn><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">S^\prime=\frac{SV-\frac{it}{eF}}{V}=\frac{\left(2\times0.5\right)-\frac{3.7\times6\times3600}{3\times96500}}{0.5}=1.45M </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 18 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি ব্যাটারিতে সংঘটিত অর্ধকোষ বিক্রিয়া&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x27F6;</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="width: 9.801em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>27</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="width: 2.647em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.163em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.16em, 2.349em, -999.998em);                     </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সাম্যাবস্থায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>E</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9.24</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>36</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="width: 18.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1015.45em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1171"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1181" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1184"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1186" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1187"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1192"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9.24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1202"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1203"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1205"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1206"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>E</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9.24</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>36</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">E=0,\ 0=E^0-\frac{RT}{nF}\ \ln{k}\therefore k=9.24\times{10}^{36} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 19 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 42px;"></p>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1364"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1365"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1372"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.34</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2.3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.64</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.34</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2.3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2.64</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">E_{cell}^0=E_{Cu/Cu^{2+}}^0+E_{Mg^{2+}/Mg}^0
=\left(-0.34-2.3\right)V=-2.64V </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 21 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; position: relative; width: 1.551em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.55em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.594em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1460"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1461"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">
{\rm Ag}^{2+}+2Cu\rightarrow Ag+Cu^{2+}</script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>

Cu+2{\rm Ag}^+\rightarrow Cu^{2+}+2Ag</script></span></p>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 23 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোনটিকে তড়িৎকোষের লবণ সেতুতে ব্যবহার করা হয়?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.895</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="width: 9.52em;             </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>55.85</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.93</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1636" style="width: 16.314em;         <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 25 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>&nbsp;একটি তামার তারের মধ্য দিয়ে&nbsp;4s&nbsp;ধরে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="width: 2.908em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.386em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.35em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1671"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">2\ mA </script></span>&nbsp;তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে কতটি ইলেকট্রন প্রবাহিত হবে?</p>

                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="width: 5.239em; </label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="width: 5.239em;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="width: 1.969em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="width: 20.33em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1775"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1776"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1778"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1779"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>e</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">Q=It=Ne\Rightarrow N=\frac{It}{e}=\frac{2\times{10}^{-3}\times4}{1.6\times{10}^{-19}}=5\times{10}^{16} </script></span>&nbsp;টি</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    

            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Engineering Weekly Live Exam</h4>
                            </div>
















<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 35 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>গলিত অ্যালুমিনিয়াম ক্লোরাইডের ভিতর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-204-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5175" style="width: 5.069em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.137em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.1em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5176"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5179" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                 </div>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>W</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>I</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>300</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>27</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>64333.33</mn><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-206">W=\frac{MIt}{xF}\Rightarrow t=\frac{WxF}{MI}=\frac{300\times{10}^3\times3\times96500}{27\times5\times{10}^4}=64333.33s </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 36 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-207-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mi>Z</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.02</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.02</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5245" style="width: 23.139em; top: -3.053em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5246"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5247" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>Z</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-209">E_{cell}=E_{Cell}^0-\frac{2.303\times RT}{nF}\log{\frac{\left[Zn^{2+}\right]}{\left[Ag^+\right]^2}}</script></span></p>

<p>কোষ বিক্রিয়া :&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-210-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>Z</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8.314</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>373</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.02</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.037</mn></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5363" style="width: 31.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 25.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1025.99em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5364"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5365" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5366" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5377" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5378"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 5.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1005.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.703em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5401"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5402" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.303</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5403" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.314</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5405" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5406" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">373</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5407"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5410" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5416" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.02</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 1.559em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5418"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5419"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5420" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.02</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5421" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.68em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.037</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>Z</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1.1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>373</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.02</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.037</mn></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">Zn+2\ {\rm Ag}^+\rightarrow Zn^{2+}+2Ag \therefore E_{cell}=1.1-\frac{2.303\times8.314\times373}{2\times96500}\log{\frac{0.02}{{0.02}^2}=1.037} </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 37 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>সালফিউরিক এসিডের লঘু জলীয় দ্রবণের মধ্য দিয়ে প্লাটিনাম তারের মাধ্যমে 1 ঘন্টা বিদ্যুৎ প্রবাহিত করায় আদর্শ তাপমাত্রা ও চাপে 250 mL হাইড্রোজেন গ্যাস উৎপন্ন হয়।বিদ্যুতের প্রবাহ মাত্রা কত ছিল?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.11em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5532" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1005.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.785em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5534"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5535" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.0821</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5537" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5538" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5539" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3600</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.598</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.592em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>250</mn><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.0821</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>273</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.598</mn><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-215">PV=nRT\Rightarrow n=\frac{PV}{RT};\ Q=neF\Rightarrow n=\frac{Q}{eF}=\frac{It}{eF} \\
\therefore\frac{PV}{RT}=\frac{It}{eF}\Rightarrow I=\frac{ePVF}{RTt}=\frac{2\times1\times\frac{250}{1000}\times96500}{0.0821\times273\times3600}=0.598A 
</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 38 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>বিগলিত&nbsp;NaCl&nbsp;এর মধ্যে&nbsp;&nbsp;50mA&nbsp;তড়িৎ 2&nbsp;ঘণ্টা যাবৎ প্রবাহিত করলে কতটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-216-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5543" style="width: 2.498em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.05em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5544"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5545" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5546"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.157em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5548" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-216">Na^+ </script></span>&nbsp;আয়ন ক্যাথোডে আধান প্রশমিত করবে?</p>

                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-220-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.21</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5582" style="width: 5.831em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-221-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>Z</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>23</mn><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.086</mn><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5593" style="width: 23.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1019.51em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5594"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5595" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5597" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5598" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5599" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5601" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5602" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5603"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5604" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5605" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5606" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5610" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5611"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5612"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5614"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5615"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5617" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">60</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">60</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.086</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>Z</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>23</mn><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.086</mn><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-221">W=Zit=\frac{23}{96500\times1}\times50\times{10}^{-3}\times2\times60\times60=0.086g</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-222-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5627" style="width: 3.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1002.46em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5628"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5629" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5630" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5631"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5633" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-222">\therefore Na^+</script></span>&nbsp;আয়নের সংখ্যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-223-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.086</mn><mn>23</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5634" style="width: 11.723em; </span>
            </div>

        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 39 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>নিকেল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-224-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5654" style="width: 4.063em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-224">\left({\rm Ni}^{2+}\right)\ </script></span>ইলেকট্রোপ্লেটিংয়ের পূর্বে ও পরে একটি চামচের ভর যথাক্রমে&nbsp;2.05g&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;2.55g&nbsp;হলে, ইলেকট্রোপ্লেটিং করতে কতটুকু চার্জ প্রয়োজন হয়েছিল?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                     </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-227-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1643.95</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5685" style="width: 4.966em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.055em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1004.05em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5686"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1643.95</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5688" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1643.95</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-227">1643.95C </script></span></p>

                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

            </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-230-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>z</mi><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mn>96500</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>e</mi></mrow><mi>M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2.55</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>58.7</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1643.95</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5697" style="width: 29.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1024.06em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5698"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5699" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5701" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5702" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5707" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.691em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.768em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5708" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5709" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5710" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5713" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5716" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.89em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.965em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5717"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5718" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5719" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5720" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5721" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5722" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5723" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.06em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.059em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5725" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.969em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1006.8em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -3.4em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5726"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5727" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5729"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5730" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5731"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5732" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.55</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5733" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5734" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.05</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5735" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5736" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5737" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">58.7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.97em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.969em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1643.95</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5741" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>z</mi><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mi>e</mi></mfrac><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mn>96500</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>×</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>e</mi></mrow><mi>M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2.55</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>58.7</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1643.95</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-230">W=zQ=\frac{\frac{M}{e}Q}{96500}\ \ \therefore Q=\frac{96500\times W\times e}{M}=\frac{96500\times\left(2.55-2.05\right)\times2}{58.7}=1643.95C </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 41 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-232-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5752" style="width: 4.734em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-239-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>o</mi><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.76</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.51</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5797" style="width: 23.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1019.43em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5798"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5799" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5801" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.961em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
