clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5984"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5985"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5987"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5988"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5990" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5992" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5993"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5994" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5995"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5996"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5997" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5998" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>Z</mi><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2.7</mn><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-246">W=ZIt\Rightarrow Z=\frac{W}{It}=\frac{2.7}{5\times50\times60}\ gC^{-1}=1.8\times{10}^{-4}\ gC^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 46 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>25°C&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা ও&nbsp;1&nbsp;atm&nbsp;চাপে&nbsp;0.01M&nbsp;ঘনমাত্রার&nbsp;HCl&nbsp;দ্রবণ বিশিষ্ট হাইড্রোজেন তড়িৎদ্বারের জারণ বিভব কত?&nbsp;</p>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>25°C ও&nbsp;1atm&nbsp;চাপে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-247-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>H</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0591</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1182</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5999" style="width: 20.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.85em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6000"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6001"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6002" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6003" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.0591</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6007" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6009"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">log</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6012"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-6013" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6014"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6015"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1182</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6024" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>H</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0591</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1182</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-247">E_H=0.0591\times\left(-\log{\left(0.01\right)}\right)=0.1182\approx0.12V  </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>

                    <div class="input-group-prepend">

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-251-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6067" style="width: 5.649em;                     </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-252-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>b</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>b</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6081" style="width: 4.693em;                         <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধাতুর সক্রিয়তা সিরিজ অনুসারে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-253-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>Z</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>b</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6095" style="width: 11.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.63em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6096"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6097" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6098" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6100" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6101" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6103" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6104" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6106" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6107" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6109" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>Pt&nbsp;&nbsp;তড়িৎদ্বার ব্যবহার করে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-254-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6111" style="width: 9.056em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-255-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>63.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>17.76</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi><mi>u</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>17.76</mn><mn>63.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2798</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6126" style="width: 15.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1013.03em, 6.191em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6127"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.035em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1013.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6128" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-6130" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1005em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.498em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6131"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6135" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6138" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3600</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); <p>অবশিষ্ট কপার আয়নের মোল সংখ্যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-256-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.2798</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.7202</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6161" style="width: 12.174em; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.7202</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-257-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6171" style="width: 0.658em; <p><strong>বিকল্প:</strong></p>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.12em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.125em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.44</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6224" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>S</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>V</mi><mi>S</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-259">S' = \frac{VS- \frac{It}{CP}}{V} = \frac{0.5\times 2 - \frac{3\times 5\times 3600}{2\times 96500}}{0.5} = 1.44  \ M</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                <div class="serial">

                                <h4>Varsity Weekly MCQ Live Exam W-05 (10)</h4>

                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="width: 2.78em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.279em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1002.19em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-557"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm Cr(s) </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবগুলো সমান</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Ag দ্রবণে 1F&nbsp;বিদ্যুৎ চালনা করলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="width: 8.199em;         <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="width: 2.643em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm Zn^{2+} </script></span>&nbsp;আয়নের ঘনমাত্রা ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="width: 2.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.76em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-686"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-688"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-691"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm Zn^{2+}</script></span> আয়নের ঘনমাত্রা হ্রাস ও তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি।&nbsp;</p>

<p>এই অপশনটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="width: 11.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1009.51em, 2.748em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.89em, 4.305em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-731"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-733"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-734"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm E=E_{cell}^o-\frac{2.303RT}{2}log\frac{[Zn^{2+}]}{[Cu^{2+}]}</script></span>&nbsp;অনুসারে সর্বোৎকৃষ্ট।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 14 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>মারকারি ক্যাথোড সেলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-922" style="width: 2.759em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.237em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.24em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-923"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm NaCl</script></span> এর জলীয় দ্রবণের তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষণে কোনটি উৎপন্ন হয় না?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.459em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.46em, 2.461em, -999.998em);                     </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 15 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>চার্জমুক্ত হওয়ার প্রবণতার নিম্নক্রম অনুসারে নিচের কোন সেটটি সঠিক?</p>

            </div>
        </div>

                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="width: 9.346em; <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 16 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি কোষে কোষ বিক্রিয়া সাম্যাবস্থায় আছে। নিচের কোনটি তা নির্দেশ করে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>96500</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>24125</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>24125</mn><mn>96500</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="width: 18.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1014.72em, 2.707em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">96500</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24125</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>96500</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>∴</mo><mn>24125</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>24125</mn><mn>96500</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm 1F=96500\ C 
\therefore24125C=\frac{24125}{96500}=0.25\ F </script></span></p>

                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 18 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>সমঘনমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="width: 3.69em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.02em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.02em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1117"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1121"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm CuSO_4</script></span> এর দুটি ভিন্ন দ্রবণের তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষণে যথাক্রমে 1C ও 1F&nbsp;বিদ্যুৎ চালনা করলে ক্যাথোডে সঞ্চিত কপারের পরিমাণের অনুপাত কত হবে?</p>

                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>96500</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="width: 11.928em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1141"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1142"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1148"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.26em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1151"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>96500</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>96500</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm \frac{W_1}{W_2}=\frac{ZQ_1}{{\rm ZQ}_2}=\frac{1C}{96500C}=\frac{1}{96500} </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 19 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনো পরিবাহীর মধ্য দিয়ে 3 A&nbsp;প্রবাহ 3&nbsp;ঘণ্টাব্যাপী প্রবাহিত হলে কত আধান প্রবাহিত হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3600</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>32400</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="width: 14.469em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1159"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
            </div>
